main event: A seventeen year old boy reported sighting three round lights in the sky while returning home from basketball practice on November 3, 1965.
interesting points: The sighting occurred at approximately 10:20 PM local time., The boy was driving an automobile when he first saw the lights., After driving for about half a mile, he stopped the car and got out to observe the lights above him., The lights were about 300 feet in the air., The boy had an impression that the object was frightened and suggested it had been present in the area during the past month.
sighted object: three round lights in the sky
witness description: a seventeen year old boy returning from basketball practice
